meanings.sent1: I had to skidoo from the boring party last night.
meanings.sent2: She always skidoos when it's time to clean her room.
meanings.sent3: When the movie got too scary, the kids decided to skidoo out of the room.
meanings.sent4: The cat saw the dog approaching and skidooed up the tree.
meanings.sent5: The thief tried to skidoo from the scene before anyone noticed.

meanings.sent1: We rented a skidoo to explore the snowy mountains.
meanings.sent2: The skidoo zoomed across the icy terrain effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The family packed hot cocoa for their skidoo adventure in the mountains.
meanings.sent4: The skidoo glided over the snow like a sleek white wolf.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the skidoo echoed through the winter forest.
